subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Skateboards
Snowboarding
Surfing
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Athletes who compete in skateboarding, snowboarding, surfing and BMX are getting their own awards show. The inaugural Action Sports Awards will be taped Nov. 30 in the Los Angeles area and be shown Dec. 10 on Fox, it was announced yesterday. Winners will be decided by a combination of fan voting and a panel of expert judges.
